headline: Greenbrier Names Travis Williams as Head of Investor Relations
summary: The Greenbrier Companies (NYSE: GBX), a leading supplier of railroad freight car equipment and services, today announced the appointment of Travis Williams as its new Head of Investor Relations, reporting to Michael Donfris, Chief Financial Officer.

raw.headline: Greenbrier Names Travis Williams as Head of Investor Relations
raw.summary: The Greenbrier Companies (NYSE: GBX), a leading supplier of railroad freight car equipment and services, today announced the appointment of Travis Williams as its new Head of Investor Relations, reporting to Michael Donfris, Chief Financial Officer.

headline: Invesco Ltd. Enters into Agreement to Sell Management Agreements Relating to Canadian Fund Business to CI Investments Inc.
summary: Invesco Ltd. ("Invesco"), Invesco Canada Ltd. ("Invesco Canada") announced today that it has entered into a definitive agreement to sell the management agreements relating to its Canadian fund business to CI Investments Inc., operating as CI Global Asset Management ("CI GAM"). Under the terms of the agreement and subject to the receipt of all necessary consents and approvals, CI GAM will become the manager and portfolio manager of the Invesco Canada family of retail mutual funds and exchange tra

headline: CI Global Asset Management to Acquire Invesco's Canadian Investment Fund Assets and Form Long-Term Strategic Partnership
summary: CI Global Asset Management ("CI GAM") and Invesco Ltd. (NYSE: IVZ), a leading global asset management firm, today announced an agreement under which CI GAM will acquire the management agreements relating to Invesco's Canadian fund business with combined total assets under management of approximately C$26 billion.

raw.headline: CI Global Asset Management to Acquire Invesco's Canadian Investment Fund Assets and Form Long-Term Strategic Partnership
raw.summary: CI Global Asset Management ("CI GAM") and Invesco Ltd. (NYSE: IVZ), a leading global asset management firm, today announced an agreement under which CI GAM will acquire the management agreements relating to Invesco's Canadian fund business with combined total assets under management of approximately C$26 billion.

headline: Buy These 3 Top-Ranked Invesco Mutual Funds Poised for Growth

headline: Ethereum Faces Key 2026 Resistance, but $5.04 Million ETH ETF Inflows Spell Hope
summary: Ethereum holds a bullish trendline as $5M ETF inflows return, but ETH must break $3,150 resistance to extend gains.
